option.od: print the help message and exit.
input image filename. If this is omitted the image will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Convert a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image to an XML representation.

description.p: Convert a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image to an XML representation.
The XML representation is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert PNG file inp.png to the XML file out.xml.
